mapper.select: select m.memnum memnum, f.filmnum filmnum, b.booknum booknum, mo.movieimgurl movieimgurl, f.filmname filmname, ms.mstarttime mstarttime,t.theathername theathername, br.brname brname from membership m, charge c, book b, mschedule ms, theather t , branch br , purchasefilm p, film f, movieimg mo where m.memnum=c.memnum and c.chargenum=b.chargenum and b.mschedulenum=ms.mschedulenum and t.theathernum=ms.theathernum and t.branchnum=br.branchnum and p.purchasefilmnum=ms.purchasefilmnum and p.filenum=f.filmnum and f.filmnum=mo.filmnum and m.memnum=${memNum}
